item.title: W/C, Mining Tut
item.dc:creator: @Haxor_X Haxor X
item.description:
@Haxor_X wrote:

it really isn’t that hard to do…

for wood cutting do it like this…
go to your object first click case…

add codes like this…

if(objectID == ### && playerHasItem(###))
{
sendMessage("TEXT");
addSkillXP(###, skill#);
addItem(###, Amount);
} else {
sendMessage("you need a axe idiot");
}

ok you should know how to fill in the other stuff…

this would work for minning also…
well yea thats all im telling you…

Read full topic
